body.content = "<div><div>\n<div><span><img height=\"250\" src=\"../hostedContents/1/$value\" width=\"176.2295081967213\" style=\"vertical-align:bottom; width:176px; height:250px\"></span>\n\n</div>\n\n\n</div>\n</div>";
